['DescriptionAntilia Properties is a highly reputed Real Estate Company specializing in Residential and Commercial properties in Dubai.If you are buying a new property or selling an existing one, Antilia is ready to assist you with your Real Estate needs in a fast, courteous and professional manner.

* MINS 25 DOWNTOWN DUBAI 
* MINS 5 MOHAMMED BIN ZAYED ROAD

* MINS 18 EXPO 2020 SITE
* MINS 18 AL MAKTOUM INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT
Villanova is conveniently located near the intersection of Al Ain road, between Emirates Road and Shaikh Zayed bin Hamdan Al Nahyan Street.
Situated within a serene community, Villanova offers spacious 3, 4, 5 and 5+ bedroom villas and townhouses inspired by modern Mediterranean architecture.
Easy payment plan with great benefits:
* 50/50 over 3 years post completion easy payment plan
* 5 years service charges free
* 50% DLD waiver
Antilia Properties we believe on quality and comforts.

MUBASHAR MUSHTAQ+971544596505

descriptions: ['DescriptionSituated on the eastern tip of the iconic Palm Jumeirah\x92s trunk, One Palm is the most luxurious residential address in Dubai. Developed by Omnyat and managed by the prestigious Dorchester Collection, One Palm features 25 storeys and ultra-luxurious and limited\xa0collection of 94 luxury residences. Designed by award-winning\xa0Soma architects, the project also boasts lush sanctuaries and landscaping by Vladimir Djurovic. Buyers are able to choose\xa0from interiors designed by Japanese firm Super Potato and London based luxury design studio, Elicyon \x96 famed for its\xa0involvement in the renowned One Hyde Park building in London\x92s Knightsbridge.\xa0John Taylor Luxury Real Estate is pleased to offer for sale this 3 bedroom residence, designed by Elicyon, at The One Palm - a super high spec prime luxury development for the most discerning clients.Situated on 16th floor with three en-suite bedrooms, three underground garage parking spaces and 3,236 sq.ft. (301 sq.m.) of total residence space, the residence is a picture of luxurious refinement.Key features of this Residence are:Panoramic views across Dubai Marina, Bluewaters Island, and Arabian GulfFloor to ceiling windowsOpen plan living, dining with a wrap-around large private terrace2 kitchens:Show kitchen-fully fitted Italian kitchen from Varenna by Poliform, integrated Gaggenau cooking, cooling and cleaning appliances.Preparation kitchen- European kitchen offering a full suite of integrated Miele appliancesEn-suite bedrooms with balcony/Juliet balconyMaids room and bathroom\xa0Laundry room and storage roomMaster suite includes a beautifully crafted walk-in closet\xa0by Poliform offering generous storageFully finished stone bathrooms, tap-ware from Dornbracht and Toto Neorest automatic toiletsIntuitive and intelligent control of lighting, climate, blinds and security by Crestron with Dynalite touchpadsSecurity and privacy with a maximum of 2 units per lift lobbyThe One Palm is a stunning residential development with a vast range of amenities for residents. These include:Unique sea facing lobbyResidents Club (Exclusive dining and a la carte services)Business Lounge, meeting facilities, libraryLandscaped gardens and terraces with water featuresFitness centreSpa with treatment, steam and sauna rooms800 sq.m. outdoor pool25 m indoor lap poolChildren\x92s play area and poolSalonBBQ areaPrivate jettyPrivate beach access12- seat indoor cinema and outdoor cinema400 car spaces in total of which approximately 200 are oversizedExtra-large wash baysDedicated electric car charging baysDriver\x92s waiting lounge and change roomAdditional storage areaPAYMENT PLAN:5% Booking Fee. 20% On Signing SPA + 4%(DLD Fees). 10% Within 60 days of Signing SPA. 10% Within 120 days of Signing SPA. 55% On Completion Date, which is expected to be 3 Quarter of 2020.In addition to this particular residence, we can present to you other options of residences (simplex and duplex, 4-5 bedroom) available at The One Palm. Prices range from 14,570,000 AED up to 93,300,000 AED for the ultra luxury 5 bedroom duplex penthouse.For more information or to arrange a viewing of the showroom, call Inesa Pevceviciene on +971555999015 / +97143941977 or visit www.john-taylor.ae for further details.']

title_advert: ['مجموعة اراضي للبيع بالجملة في عجمان']
amenities: ['Private Garden']
descriptions:
['Descriptionانتهز الفرصة الان 
أراضي سكنية للبيع في عجمان بمنطقة الزاهية بقسط شهري 8300 درهم فقط 
تصريح البناء أرضي وأول،
مساحات تبدأ من 160 متر مربع على شوارع أسفلت بموقع حيوي في منطقة الزاهية بعجمان،
خدمات الكهرباء والماء والاتصالات متوفرة في المنطقة
يقع المشروع على وصلة مباشرة تربط بين شارع الشيخ محمد بن زايد وشارع الشيح مكتوم بن راشد بالاتجاه إلى دبي وراس الخيمة وأم القوين وكورنيش عجمان مباشرة
تملك حر لجميع الجنسيات
------------------------------
شركة الراسخون للعقارات
خبرة اكثر من 17 عام بالعقارات ، خبراء العقارات بالامارات
تعتبر المؤسسة كيان استثماري لابد وأن يرتكز على مقومات النجاح ثلاثية الأبعاد
المشروعية ، الخبرة ، رأس المال العامل
ومن هذا المنطلق تبلورت رؤية الشركة في أن تكون رائدة في مجال الاستثمار والتسويق العقاري بدولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة ، وأن تقدم خدمة مميزة للعملاء وربح مرضي للمستثمرين والملاك .. وذلك في إطار بيئة مثالية لأفراد الشركة.
المؤسسة قائمة من يوم 2002/6/10 تم وضع حجر الأساس لشركة الراسخون للعقارات بإمارة دبي والتي كانت اللبنة الأساسية في جدار الشركة الراسخ.
واستطاعت الشركة في زمن قياسي تحقيق أعلى المستهدفات البيعية من خلال تكوين نخبة من العملاء وأن ننال رضاهم ،
إضافه إلى تحقيق التنوع في الاستثمار وإداره الاستثمار بحيث شملت مجالات عدة من الاستثمار ابتداء من الاستثمار بالبيع والشراء وصولاً إلى الاستثمار في المخططات ( تسويق الأراضي ) السكنية والتجارية على حد سواء .']

title_advert: ['G+2 Prime Location.']
descriptions:
['DescriptionThe owner of this plot has designs for 14 three and four bedroom townhouses.
G+2 Freehold, Clean plot with a Title deed, Fully paid, No outstanding loan and ready to be sold or constructed. All utilities and infrastructure works in Jumeirah Village Circle are 100% completed and there are no delays to start construction.
Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) is an emerging freehold community where all types of property are available: villas, apartments, townhouses, offices, retail and plots for development.
Nakheel - the master developer, has developed 4 townhouses & villa communities in JVC, but the rest of the community consist of projects built by private developers. The location of central with easy accesses from Al Khail and Hessa roads. There are many schools, parks and nurseries in the community. 10 minutes’ drive to Dubai Marina.']

Forte T1, an exceptional  two tower residential project located in the world renowned opera district in Downtown, Dubai. Forte Apartment Tower 1 is composed of 70 storeys while its Tower 2 features 40 storeys .Designed by internationally renowned and world-class architecture practice Nikken Sekkei, the dual-tower complex reflects the Japanese firm’s values of community credibility, selective design and collective independence. Each apartment is generously appointed and finished to the highest possible standards, as is the hallmark of any Emaar development.
Situated in Dubai's new cultural centre, Forte is a two-tower residential development, set apart by its distinctive location and aesthetic architecture which adds to the ambiance of The Opera District.Forte is superbly located on Mohammed Bin Rashid Boulevard, Downtown Dubai and forms part of The Opera District, offering an unprecedented life for its residents.

La Mer is a world- class beachfront destination that incorporates trendy, minimalist design	and features, an eclectic mix of casual and fine dining, leisure and entertainment, retail and	hospitality experiences, as well as a residential community. The destination is built across five	kilometers of pristine white beaches and is flanked by two man-made peninsulas that stretch	into the sea.	
   Located at Jumeriah 1, between Jumeirah Bay and Pearl Jumeira and in proximity to other	Meraas destinations including City Walk and Boxpark, La Mer allows visitors and residents to	experience uninterrupted views of sea, Dubai, iconic skyline and the calming sounds of the	sea. Major attractions include Laguna Waterpark, Roxy Cinemas and a collection of local and	international restaurants, shops and beach-focused activities.`
